score_multipliers._description: Content-type-specific score adjustments to compensate for LLM applying overly strict editorial standards to marketing content. Set multiplier to 1.0 to disable adjustment.

coherence._rationale: Marketing content gets 25% boost because LLM applies editorial voice consistency standards that aren't appropriate for landing pages with varied CTAs and headlines

verification._rationale: Marketing content gets 30% boost because self-descriptive claims on brand-owned pages don't need citations like editorial content does

provenance._rationale: No adjustments for provenance - metadata completeness standards apply equally to all content types

transparency._rationale: No adjustments for transparency - disclosure standards apply equally to all content types

resonance._rationale: No adjustments for resonance - engagement and cultural fit standards apply equally to all content types

attributes.label: AI vs Human Labeling Clarity

source_row.How to Collect (API/Scrape): Scrape for meta tags or labels ('AI-generated', 'human-created')
source_row.Scoring Rule (1\u201310): 10 if clearly labeled; 5 if ambiguous; 1 if missing

scoring_rule_parsed.description: 10 if clearly labeled; 5 if ambiguous; 1 if missing

attributes.detection_method: Scrape for meta tags or labels ('AI-generated', 'human-created')

attributes.label: Author/Brand Identity Verified

source_row.How to Collect (API/Scrape): Content-type aware detection: Extract visible byline for blog/article content; check schema.org author/publisher, meta tags, or footer attribution for landing pages
source_row.Scoring Rule (1\u201310): 10 if explicitly verified; 8 if visible byline (blog/article) or schema.org author; 7 if meta author tag or schema.org publisher; 6 if footer attribution or credits page; 3 if unknown; 2 if missing for blog/article content
source_row.Thresholds / Flags: Flag: missing byline on blog/article; no attribution on landing page
source_row.Notes / Example Tools: Twitter/X, LinkedIn, schema.org/Person, schema.org/Organization, meta author tags, footer credits

scoring_rule_parsed.description: 10 if explicitly verified; 8 if visible byline or schema.org author; 7 if meta author or schema.org publisher/contributor; 6 if footer attribution or credits page; 3 if unknown; 2 if missing for blog/article

attributes.detection_method: Content-type aware: Visible byline for articles/blogs; schema.org author/publisher/contributor, meta author tags, or footer attribution for landing pages

attributes.detection_method: HTTP HEAD/GET; parse content-type & manifest; CAI verify API
